page.title: 10TODAYS GAMES
page.content: {Skipping To play you need three or more players and a length of rope.You need a person to hold each end of the rope,they turn the rope by rotating their arms in a wide circle and they must keep time with one another,this is called cawing.The other people jump in the ropes one at a time and jump until they stop the rope and have to take their turn on the end. {Hide'n'go seek To play this you need at least 2 people.One person goes'it' and has to hide his eyes and count to 100 while the other players hide.Once 'it' has counted to 100 they go and seek the others the first person to be found is 'it' next time.While 'it'seeks the others can try to get back to the place where 'it'counted before being caught,this place is called the den.
